name: "EBBI" Ejaan Baku Bahasa Indonesia
description: “EBBI: Spelling Baku Bahasa Indonesia” is a learning game about using standard Indonesian words to help students get used to using EBI properly and correctly in a more interesting and less boring way. The game is built based on the Indonesian Spelling (EBI) and Indonesian General Guidelines (PUEBI) as well as the Indonesian Big Dictionary (KBBI).
